mapper.insert:
insert into sys_job_msg_rela (
sched_name,
job_name,
job_group,
msg_code,
remind_code,
create_date,
create_time,
create_user,
update_date,
update_time,
update_user,
time_stamp,
rec_stat
) values (
#{schedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{msgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remindCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate,
#{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
)
mapper.select: select sched_name, job_name, job_group, msg_code, remind_code, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_job_msg_rela

select sched_name, job_name, job_group, msg_code, remind_code,create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_job_msg_rela where 1=1
and instr(sched_name,#{schedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
and instr(job_name,#{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
and instr(job_group,#{jobGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
and instr(msg_code,#{msgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0
and remind_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{remindCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and rec_stat like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
order by time_stamp desc

select sched_name, job_name, job_group, msg_code,remind_code, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_job_msg_rela where rec_stat = '0' order by time_stamp desc
